Classes in dk.pervasive.jcaf used by dk.pervasive.jcaf
Context
          The Context class represents a simple context for an Entity, which contains various types of ContextItem.
ContextClientHandler
          This interface defines a Context Client Handler.
ContextEvent
          A generic event which indicates that context has been changed.
ContextItem
          This interface defines a context item -- i.e.
ContextService
          This interface defines a Context Service.
ContextTransformer
          This interface defines a context transformer.
ContextTransformerException
          Signals that an error occured while transforming context information.
DiscoveryEvent
          A generic event which indicates that an Entity have been discovered.
Entities
           
Entity
          This interface defines an Entity in the real world that we want to model in order to keep track of its context.
EntityConfig
          This interface defines an Entiry Configuration.
EntityEnvironment
          Defines a set of methods that a entity uses to communicate with its ContextService container, for example, to get a RMI handle to other processes, get Context Translators, dispatch requests, or write to a log file.
EntityListener
          Implementations of this interface receives notification about changes to the context of an Entity.
EntityListenerHandler
          This interface defines a Entity Listener Handler.
EntityNotFoundException
           
PeerHandler
          This interface defines a peer-to-peer handler for context services, including locating peers based on their URI.
Relationship
          This interface is an empty placeholder for modelling relationships between an entity's context and its context items.
RemoteContextClient
           
RemoteDiscoveryListener
          Implementations of this interface receives notification about discovering of an Entity.
RemoteEntityListener
          Implementations of this interface receives notification about changes to the context of an Entity.
SecureContextService
          This interface represents a secure context service.
TransformerRepository
          A Transformer Repository hold a range of Context Transformer, who can transfomr from one (or more) types of context information to another.
XMLSerializable
          This interface is used to serialize an object to XML.
